title: Still not fixed. Audio/fps bug patch 6.6

embed.description: I'm playing on a 2013 13' Macbook Pro Retina Every time a teamfight happens, my FPS drops to like 5 (previously I had consistent 60 FPS even in the densest of team fights) and the sound starts cackling/rippling in a similar fashion to a particularly wet fart.

body:
I'm just gonna post all other links where people are complaining about this situation so Riot understands to fix this now. 

- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/vGTtowEV-you-actively-chose-to-not-fix-the-issue-affecting-mac-users
- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/RVT3b6LJ-im-happy-theres-no-urf-today-since-i-still-cannot-play-on-mac-osx-66-patch
- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/LEML38PW-mac-gameplay-is-awful
- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/EIneHydR-fps-drops-mac?page=1
- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/cY07yXQJ-riot-come-on-still-nothing-on-fps
- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/qtPE20Ur-massive-fps-dropschronic-disconnecting
- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/9p8HOW1X-howling-abyss-200-500ms-ping-sounds-ripping-and-fps-drop

Mac users who are going through this problem, at this point the only way to reach their attention is to spam the boards with this problem, so do that and MAYBE we can not only hear that they acknowledge the problem, but are going to fix it right away.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

For context, I don't work on the team handling this particular issue. I did post on the boards last week on a post acknowledging this issue - may have been yours, actually? 

The team is aware of this issue and are actively working to resolve it.
Yeah thank you for the update. At this point I'm not gonna bother you guys anymore and hope this is fixed in patch 6.7
Still no solid response from them...I tried spamming the report a bug forum so maybe it would get looked at when they go to remove the spam posts
